## ğŸ“– About

A modern platform for discovering, exploring, and contributing to the best open source projects from around the world. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

### âœ¨ Features

- ğŸŒ **Multi-language Support**: Turkish and English interface
- ğŸ” **Advanced Search**: Filter by category, language, and tags
- â­ **Featured Projects**: Carefully curated outstanding projects
- ï¿½ **Sponsor System**: Platinum, Gold, and Silver sponsor tiers
- ğŸ‘¥ **Contributors**: Beautiful contributor visualization with contrib.rocks
- ğŸ“± **Responsive Design**: Perfect experience on all devices
- ï¿½ **Modern UI/UX**: Tailwind CSS with Framer Motion animations
- ğŸ”„ **Real-time GitHub Data**: Live stars, forks, and contributor counts

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/furkanczay/openprojects.git
cd openprojects

# Install dependencies
pnpm install

# Start development server
pnpm dev
```

Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) in your browser.
